title: Ethereum Miner Turns to Dogecoin: BIT Mining Dumps ETH After Merge, Seeking Greener Pastures
description:
Following Ethereum’s switch from proof of work to proof of stake, BIT Mining has transitioned from Ethereum mining to relying heavily on Dogecoin and Litecoin for income. Analyst Mike Fay raises concerns over BIT Mining’s decision to sell one-third of its Ethereum holdings and significantly increase its Dogecoin treasury. In a surprising twist in the [...]
